org.epics.pvData.channelAccess
Interface ChannelPutGet

public interface ChannelPutGet

Channel access put/get request. The put is performed first, followed optionally by a process request, and then by a get request.

Author:
mrk

Method Summary
 void destroy()
          Destroy the ChannelPutGet
 java.util.BitSet getGetBitSet()
          Get the BitSet which describes which input fields have been modified since the last request.
 java.util.BitSet getPutBitSet()
          Get the BitSet which describes the output fields that the requester has modified since the last request.
 void putGet(boolean lastRequest)
          Issue a put/get request.
 

Method Detail

getPutBitSet

Get the BitSet which describes the output fields that the requester has modified since the last request.

Returns:
The BitSet.

getGetBitSet

java.util.BitSet getGetBitSet()
Get the BitSet which describes which input fields have been modified since the last request.

Returns:
The BitSet.

putGet

void putGet(boolean lastRequest)
Issue a put/get request. This fails if the request can not be satisfied. If it fails ChannelPutGetRequester.putDone is called before putGet returns.

Parameters:
lastRequest - Is this the last request?

destroy

void destroy()
Destroy the ChannelPutGet
